body.name: Baby Shark Sing-Alongs 10 Button Sound Book | Baby Shark Toys | Learning & Education Toys | Interactive Baby Books for Toddlers 1-3 | Gifts for Boys & Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 26 - 28 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: BABY SHARK SING-ALONGS to enjoy 9 beloved shark songs, including the iconic 'Baby Shark' song, to read and sing along! These classic Baby Shark-themed include 'Shark Family', 'Baby Shark on the Bus', 'Five Little Fish Jumping on the Kelp', 'Baby Mermaid Shark', and more. Perfect for babies, toddlers, and preschoolers who love Baby Shark and Pinkfong characters!

OFFICIAL PINKFONG BABY SHARK BOOK that plays the iconic Baby Shark song (doo doo doo doo doo)! Our premium 10 button sound book that features 10 press-play buttons, 9 full singing songs (+ bonus Pinkfong stinger sound), and 16 colorfully illustrated pages with lyrics on non-glaring, highly durable pages.

MUSICAL BOOK THAT PLAYS FULL, CLASSIC CHILDREN'S SONGS that are easy to read and sing along! Features fun music with quality sound, child-friendly designs for kids' hands, on-off switch to save battery life as well as two AAA batteries securely placed under the safety lock cover.

BEST EDUCATIONAL TOYS FOR 1 YEAR OLDS, 2 YEAR OLDS, 3 YEAR OLDS that introduce multisensory experiences and develop fine motor skills. Practice matching by teaching kids to press song buttons on the side panel that matches the icon on the top of each page to play the music. Singing develops listening, memory, and pronunciation skills, which are important to early literacy as well as creativity.
PERFECT GIFTS FOR BOYS AND GIRLS on any occasion - birthdays, parties, baby showers, holidays, and more! Great learning toys for newborns, babies, toddlers, and preschoolers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Child Development Pinkfong’s sound books help develop cognitive & motor skills essential to healthy child development. Enhance Bonding Time Interactive and engaging, sound books assist in quality bonding time with family and friends. Safe & Sturdy Our sound books are designed and manufactured thoughtfully to be safe and durable for kids. Gifts for Toddlers Beloved worldwide, our entertaining and educational books are perfect gifts for babies & kids! Next page 1 Youtube's Favorite 2 Child Development 3 Enhance Bonding Time 4 Safe & Sturdy 5 Gifts for Toddlers

Convenient On/Off Switch Includes an easy on/off switch to save battery life and to enjoy for quiet reading time - Any parents' favorite feature! Batteries Included New book includes 2 AAA batteries. Batteries are secured in a safety lock that can be easily replaced by following the instructions on the back cover. Perfect Gift for Kids Perfect gift for newborns to preschoolers, who are fans of Baby Shark & Pinkfong. Our sing-along books are quick to put a smile on your little one! Amazing Customer Support Pinkfong's customer support covers 180 days!

Does this sound book include the iconic Baby Shark song? Yes, plus many more timeless nursery rhymes that children love to sing and dance to from our YouTube channel! Are Batteries Included? How do I replace them and are they safely secured? Yes, two AAA batteries are included as samples to get started. Only an adult should replace the batteries, following the detailed instructions on the back cover. All batteries are securely locked under a cover that requires a screwdriver to open. Are Pinkfong & Baby Shark sound books safe? Yes! Our sound books are rigorously tested and certified to be safe and durable for use by the recommended age group. If you have any further safety concern, please do not hesitate to reach out to us through Amazon to receive further assistance. The sound feature of the book does not seem to work or function properly. What should I do? We always recommend replacing the old batteries with fresh batteries by following the instructions on the back cover. If this does not fix the issue, please do not hesitate to reach out to us through Amazon Customer Support for further assistance. Do you have any unanswered questions or issues with our product? Please send us a message via Amazon. We are always on standby to answer your questions and make things right with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for all Baby Shark loving toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old daughter loves Baby Shark.She also loves to talk and sing. It's so lovely to witness her joy in learning, pressing the buttons, turning the pages, listening and singing her hearts content!But it's also an inconvenience when she's doing this while I'm driving. There is no volume control fyi. It is loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and on time delivery!
reviews.reviewText: Purchase this product for my niece for a belated Christmas gift and it showed up on time and in great shape. Sound worked perfectly for the interactive book. Everything was perfect ands he loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great song book
reviews.reviewText: 2 yr old goes directly to this book when she comes to grandmas house. We dance sing look at the book. It’s well made strong definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great interactive book
reviews.reviewText: I bought this book for my classroom that serves kiddos with autism and it’s great! It’s interactive and plays 10 different songs, definitely brought a smile to several of my kiddos faces!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As advertised. It works great. My 2 year old loves it. Love that it’s a book. My kid loves books. It’s perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like that it plays the whole song, instead of a little jingle. My almost-2 yo is obsessed and loves to sing and dance to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Book is very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This book was a great gift for my grand daughter. It has all the songs she sings everyday. This was the first gift she opened for her birthday and she wouldn’t put it down. Glad I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plays entire songs
reviews.reviewText: This book is great, and the buttons play the entire songs. I was not expecting that. Great quality.
Funciona muito bem!O som tem volume plenamente satisfatório para as crianças!

Brauchst du eine Reise in die wilde Unterwasserwelt, ohne nass zu werden? Das Baby Shark Sing-Alongs Sound Buch ist deine Karte für ein musikalisches Ozeanabenteuer! 🌊🎵Dieses Buch hat mehr Knöpfe als ein Hemdgeschäft - ganze 10 Tasten, um genau zu sein! Jeder Knopf öffnet eine melodische Tür zu einem anderen Baby Shark-Song. "Doo doo doo, das ist mein Jam!" Es ist wie ein Konzert im Kinderzimmer, ohne Ticketkauf! 🎤👶Und die Liedtexte? Besser als ein Karaoke-Abend! 16 Seiten voller bunter Illustrationen und Texte, damit du jedes Wort mitsingen kannst. Es ist Zeit, deine Flossen zu schwingen und den Ozean mit Baby Shark zu rocken! 📚🎶Dieses Buch ist nicht nur ein Geschenk, es ist ein Taifun aus Spaß! Perfekt für Geburtstage, Babypartys oder einfach, um das Zuhause mit "doo doo doo" zu beleben. Aber aufgepasst: Dieses Buch hat Suchtpotenzial für Eltern und Kinder gleichermaßen! 👪🎁Batterien? Check! Zwei AAA-Batterien sind an Bord, sicher unter dem Schloss versteckt. Also keine Panik, wenn Baby Shark plötzlich im Wohnzimmer erklingt - es sind keine geheimen Wassermaschinen im Spiel! 🔒🔋Kinderleicht zu bedienen, mit Qualitätssound und Sicherheitsschloss - ein magisches Lernabenteuer, das kleine Ozeanentdecker lieben werden! Aber Achtung: Der Baby Shark Ohrwurm könnte dein Gehirn für Stunden in seinen Fängen halten. Doo doo doo! 🦈🧠
El libro parece bueno pero cuesta mucho que funcionen los botones, creo que el problema está en el encendido, cuesta mucho que funcione. De resto estaría contenta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 4, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Livre qui fait bien le job avec 10 chansons en anglais donc le fameux "baby shark".Gros succès auprès de jumeaux bilingues de 20 mois. Piles fournies.
